text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    HIV.D.DE101TDF + 3TC + DTGFirst-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents - TDF + 3TC + DTG
    HIV.D.DE102TDF + FTC + DTGFirst-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents - TDF + FTC + DTG
    HIV.D.DE103TDF + 3TC + FTCFirst-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents - TDF + 3TC + FTC
    HIV.D.DE104TDF + 3TC + EFV 400 mgFirst-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents - TDF + 3TC + EFV 400 mg
    HIV.D.DE105Other (specify)First-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents - Other (specify)

name: FirstlineARTregimenforadultsandadolescentsCodes
title: First-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents Codes
description: Codes representing possible values for the First-line ART regimen for adults and adolescents element
